name: Power of Love
description: This is a novel puzzle game. It creatively asks you to control two people simultaneously. The game consists of three chapters and the levels become more and more difficult. Its a perfect game to exercise your brain.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Not really recommend it because its more like a browser game or something like that. Also you move 2 characters at same time using arrows buttons instead one with arrows buttons and the other one with WASD buttons.Now i understand why so many players dont have all achievements. Final note:5/10
